verses.verse: Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H3478>not<s%>, O Israel, for <S%H1524>joy<s%>, like the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>; for thou hast played the <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, departing from thy <S%H430>God<s%>; thou hast <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H868>hire<s%> upon every <S%H1637>grain-floor<s%>.
The <S%H1637>threshing-floor<s%> and the <S%H3342>winepress<s%> shall not <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H8492>them<s%>, and the new wine shall fail <S%H3584>her<s%>.

They shall not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H776>land<s%>; but <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> food in <S%H804>Assyria<s%>.

They shall not <S%H5258>pour<s%> out <S%H3196>wine<s%>- offerings to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, neither shall they be <S%H6149>pleasing<s%> unto <S%H2077>him<s%>: their sacrifices shall be unto them as the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H205>mourners<s%>; all that <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof shall be <S%H2930>polluted<s%>; for their <S%H3899>bread<s%> shall be for their <S%H5315>appetite<s%>; it shall not <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
What will ye <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4150>solemn<s%> <S%H3117>assembly<s%>, and in the day of the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>?

For <S%H1980><s%>, lo, they are gone away from <S%H7701>destruction<s%>; yet <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall gather them <S%H6908>up<s%>, <S%H4644>Memphis<s%> shall <S%H6912>bury<s%> <S%H4261>them<s%>; their pleasant things of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, <S%H7057>nettles<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H2336>them<s%>; thorns shall be in their <S%H168>tents<s%>.

The <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6486>visitation<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%>, the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7966>recompense<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%>; <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H5030>it<s%>: the prophet is a <S%H191>fool<s%>, the <S%H376>man<s%> that hath the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H7696>mad<s%>, for the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of thine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and because the <S%H4895>enmity<s%> is <S%H7227>great<s%>.

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> was a <S%H6822>watchman<s%> with my <S%H430>God<s%>: as for the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, a <S%H3352>fowler<s%>'s <S%H6341>snare<s%> is in all his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and <S%H4895>enmity<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%>.

They have <S%H6009>deeply<s%> <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> <S%H3117>themselves<s%>, as in the days of <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>: he will <S%H2142>remember<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, he will <S%H6485>visit<s%> their <S%H2403>sins<s%>.

I <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> like <S%H6025>grapes<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>; I <S%H7200>saw<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> as the <S%H1063>first-ripe<s%> in the <S%H8384>fig-tree<s%> at its first <S%H7225>season<s%>: but they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1187>Baal-peor<s%>, and <S%H5144>consecrated<s%> themselves unto the <S%H1322>shameful<s%> <S%H8251>thing<s%>, and became abominable like that which they <S%H157>loved<s%>.

As for <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, their <S%H3519>glory<s%> shall fly <S%H5774>away<s%> like a <S%H5775>bird<s%>: there shall be no <S%H3205>birth<s%>, and none with <S%H990>child<s%>, and no <S%H2032>conception<s%>.

Though they bring <S%H1431>up<s%> their <S%H1121>children<s%>, yet will I <S%H7921>bereave<s%> <S%H120>them<s%>, so that not a man shall be <S%H188>left<s%>: yea, woe also to them when I depart from <S%H5493>them<s%>!

Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, like as I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H6865>Tyre<s%>, is <S%H8362>planted<s%> in a pleasant <S%H5116>place<s%>: but <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall bring <S%H3318>out<s%> his <S%H1121>children<s%> to the <S%H2026>slayer<s%>.
Give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>, O Jehovahâ€”what wilt thou <S%H5414>give<s%>? <S%H5414>give<s%> them a <S%H7921>miscarrying<s%> <S%H7358>womb<s%> and <S%H6784>dry<s%> <S%H7699>breasts<s%>.

All their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> is in <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>; for there I <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H7455>them<s%>: because of the wickedness of their <S%H4611>doings<s%> I will drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> of my <S%H1004>house<s%>; I will <S%H160>love<s%> them no <S%H3254>more<s%>; all their <S%H8269>princes<s%> are <S%H5637>revolters<s%>.

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> is <S%H5221>smitten<s%>, their <S%H8328>root<s%> is dried <S%H3001>up<s%>, they shall <S%H6213>bear<s%> no <S%H6529>fruit<s%>: <S%H3205>yea<s%>, though they bring forth, yet will I <S%H4191>slay<s%> the <S%H4261>beloved<s%> fruit of their <S%H990>womb<s%>.
My <S%H430>God<s%> will cast them <S%H3988>away<s%>, because they did not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto <S%H5074>him<s%>; and they shall be wanderers among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
